thread.title: Steve Jobs' closest colleagues share memories of former Apple boss

author: Rhiannon Williams
title: Steve Jobs' closest colleagues share memories of former Apple boss
text: Steve Jobs Steve Jobsâ€™ closest colleagues share memories of former Apple boss Exclusive: From trying to set up Tim Cook to mooning Al Gore, Apple's chief executives have shared their most intimate memories of Steve Jobs to commemorate four years since his death Tim Cook (L), Steve Jobs (C) and Phil Schiller in 2008 Photo: AP
